root.name: Starship Catan
root.description: OverviewStarship Catan is a PC version of the eponymous two-player Card/Board game designed by Klaus Teuber. Release NotesStarship Catan was released in Germany as Sternenschiff Catan in Fall 2003. An English translation was rumored as of early 2004 on BoardGameGeek, but there is no evidence that this occured.
